00030 #include "AUD_Buffer.h"
00031 #include "AUD_Space.h"
00032 
00033 #include <cstring>
00034 #include <cstdlib>
00035 
00036 #define AUD_ALIGN(a) (a + 16 - ((long)a & 15))
00037 
00038 AUD_Buffer::AUD_Buffer(int size)
00039 {
00040     m_size = size;
00041     m_buffer = (data_t*) malloc(size+16);
00042 }
00043 
00044 AUD_Buffer::~AUD_Buffer()
00045 {
00046     free(m_buffer);
00047 }
00048 
00049 sample_t* AUD_Buffer::getBuffer() const
00050 {
00051     return (sample_t*) AUD_ALIGN(m_buffer);
00052 }
00053 
00054 int AUD_Buffer::getSize() const
00055 {
00056     return m_size;
00057 }
00058 
00059 void AUD_Buffer::resize(int size, bool keep)
00060 {
00061     if(keep)
00062     {
00063         data_t* buffer = (data_t*) malloc(size + 16);
00064 
00065         memcpy(AUD_ALIGN(buffer), AUD_ALIGN(m_buffer), AUD_MIN(size, m_size));
00066 
00067         free(m_buffer);
00068         m_buffer = buffer;
00069     }
00070     else
00071         m_buffer = (data_t*) realloc(m_buffer, size + 16);
00072 
00073     m_size = size;
00074 }
00075 
00076 void AUD_Buffer::assureSize(int size, bool keep)
00077 {
00078     if(m_size < size)
00079         resize(size, keep);
00080 }
